Description: Sherd of wall of East Greek pottery small closed vessel, perhaps an olpe; glazed outside; inscription on outside. The wheel marks inside run counter to the brush marks out.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of the Dioskouroi (Naukratis), Found in the area between the sanctuaries of the Dioskouroi and Apollo (see Petrie 1886, 16)
Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), Found in the area between the sanctuaries of the Dioskouroi and Apollo (see Petrie 1886, 16)
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXV, no. 691)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.671)
